answers.answer: I pray that everything works out for the best for you and your baby

I just went through that. My baby girl was delivered yesterday by emergency c section. She weighs 2 lbs 13 Oz & got transported by helicopter to another hospital. Today she's out of the incubator & off the breathing tube. Good luck to you.

Lots of prayers for you♡hope and pray everything goes well, and baby will be safe in NICU technology is so advanced now adays baby can survive smaller than 30 weeks. My aunt's baby was 1 pound and a couple oz when she was born she is now 7 years old and smart full of life. Dont loose faith, and stay positive momma your in my prayers♡
Oh no I'm so sorry praying for you and you're baby
May God bless you and your little one
Thanks everyone!!!! It's scary, but I believe all is well!!
Everything will b ok....r u home now?did ur blood pressure go down..any medicine they gave u?

I'm not going home until I deliver. Protein level is extremely high in my urine. With ask other tests, everything looks good, however, they want to keep a close watch on me being that it could change quickly. So, the doctor says it could be days or weeks!
Are they giving you steroids for the baby? Just stay positive. They are so good with premies now.
I will be praying for you and baby wish you the best
I will be praying for you and baby wish you the best
That happened to me 10 years ago. It was a struggle but we both made it. I'll be watching for your posts. You can do it.

question: I wasn't feeling good this past weekend so I decided to check my blood pressure Sunday night. It was 155/107. I went to the ER and was admitted with protein in my urine as well as 180/123 blood pressure. After blood work, exams, ultrasound, etc. they've determined my baby will be born within the next couple days. I'm so scared & I can't stop crying!!!!!
title: Preeclampsia at 30 weeks -Might have to deliver SOON!!!
